[[File:Snake.jpg|thumb|250px|right|A snake portrayed in ''[[Lord of the Rings Adventure Game]]'']]
'''Snakes''', sometimes referred to as [[serpents]], were reptilian creatures, often associated with the forces of darkness, and especially with the [[Dark Lord]]s. 
==Other names==
In [[Quenya]], "snake" is ''[[ango]]'' or ''[[lókë]]''. [[Sindarin]] has  ''[[lhûg]]''.
==Other versions of the legendarium==
In [[Gnomish]], ''lingos'' means "snake" and ''ling'' means "small snake".<ref>{{PE|11}}, p. 54</ref>
